name: places/ChIJVQ3SzfpYwokRyLfUKmSnQzQ
formattedAddress: 116 E 57th St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 116 E 57th St, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
Love VARTALI SALON past many years! I don’t know of a better and kinder colorist than Michael! Anna Page is also fabulous!!  I am sure they all are among best in NY.  Michael does my hair to perfection and I look forward to seeing him as he lifts my spirits And makes my  hair coloring so pretty, Always complementing my complexion and personality.

Mika, stylist, Gives a superb haircut and always wonderful about giving suggestions. It’s always appreciated.  Being I spend as much as I can on color, I can only afford him twice a year but perhaps you can have the luxury of his haircut more often than I can! The cost of service is competitive to the other  greats.  You will love the results you get from this salon regardless of who you choose!  The manicurist is also lovely and I hope someday to try her services because she makes the women’s extra special with her beautiful Maniand pedicures.

Excellent ownership and management, the best customer care, in addition. Everyone is treated with love and respect.

originalText.text:
I absolutely adore this place and am so glad I go here. Mika does my hair and he even styled it for my wedding in 2018. I try to make it when I'm back in NYC for a trim and this time got a hair treatment in. I highly recommend making an appointment to get the time and date you want.

See you all very soon!

originalText.text: Vartali is simply the best.  The entire process is wonderful - from the moment you schedule an appointment with Jane, being welcomed by everyone when you walk in, color with Ana, cut with Piet, Mika or Vartan, eyebrows with Tatyana. The output is always reliable, but when you're going to commit to 3+ hours in a salon for a cut and color, you want the process and the experience to be great - and it is!  10 years strong at Vartali Salon :)

text.text: Vartali is simply the best.  The entire process is wonderful - from the moment you schedule an appointment with Jane, being welcomed by everyone when you walk in, color with Ana, cut with Piet, Mika or Vartan, eyebrows with Tatyana. The output is always reliable, but when you're going to commit to 3+ hours in a salon for a cut and color, you want the process and the experience to be great - and it is!  10 years strong at Vartali Salon :)

originalText.text: Overall had a great experience here! Everyone is very friendly and made me feel welcomed. Had my appointment with Mika! He really took the time to listen to exactly what I wanted and helped give me pointers to take care of my hair. He is incredibly good at what he does! Also a great person overall :) Left very satisfied and loving the way I looked! Thanks for a great experience. Will be back!

text.text: Overall had a great experience here! Everyone is very friendly and made me feel welcomed. Had my appointment with Mika! He really took the time to listen to exactly what I wanted and helped give me pointers to take care of my hair. He is incredibly good at what he does! Also a great person overall :) Left very satisfied and loving the way I looked! Thanks for a great experience. Will be back!

originalText.text: I cannot even begin to say how grateful I am to have been referred to Anna! She’s incredible! I had a horrendous hair color disaster and Anna handled it with ease and professionalism. She was so thorough and really took her time to make sure I was happy! Samantha (one of the apprentices) was such a help and a doll too. Can’t say enough great things about this salon. Now I know why so many of my friends have come here for years! So happy found my new hairstylist. Thank you Anna and Samantha!!!
